mapper.select: SELECT PET_STORE_NO, PET_STORE_NAME, PET_STORE_ADDRESS, OPEN_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, OFF_DAY, PET_STORE_CALL, PET_STORE_INFO , USAGE_FEE FROM PET_STORE WHERE PET_STORE_NO = #{psno}

SELECT PET_STORE_REVIEW.REVIEW_NO, EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_NAME, MEMBER.NICKNAME, PET_STORE_REVIEW.REVIEW_CONTENT, PET_STORE_REVIEW.CREATE_DATE, PET_STORE_REVIEW.MODIFY_DATE, PET_STORE_REVIEW.RATING FROM RESERVATION JOIN EMPLOYEE ON (EMPLOYEE = EMPLOYEE_NO) JOIN PET_STORE_REVIEW ON (PET_STORE_REVIEW.RESERVATION_NO = RESERVATION.RESERVATION_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (RESERVATION.MEMBER_NO = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) WHERE RESERVATION.PET_STORE = #{psno}
